text: place. For individuals who are ascending but cannot fully transmute the body to do so, preparation for achieving ascension following natural death will be provided through subtle communications and spiritual work. Most ascending individuals will be required to engage in conscious cellular transmutation work, and will be guided through personal spiritual work, to the appropriate methodology for their personal development. Individuals who will bodily ascend will at some point in their develop- ment experience direct physical or conscious etheric contact with a Guardian 169
